title: Ticket #4352: Make DAGMan configuration link more prominent
description:
From a discussion at HTCondor Week: the user thought the "Configuration variables relating to DAGMan may be found in section 3.3.25." text in the DAGMan part of the manual was not prominent enough. They suggested possibly moving it up to the top of the "Configuration Specific to a DAG" section.

Karen -- I'm not sure what the best solution is for this. We could move that text up, or just make it bold, or something.
check_ins: 2014-Jul-24 10:49   Check-in [40747]: edit DAGMan-specific configuration explanation, section 2.10.8.5 #4352 (By Karen Miller )
creator: wenger
